title: Change in business taxes - affects both AD and AS

content.question: A decrease in business taxes would lead to an increase in national income by increasing which of the following?

choices.label: Both aggregate demand and aggregate supply

content.answer: Both aggregate demand and aggregate supply

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
